1"""Module providing a class decorator to add methods dynamically with proper parameter binding.""" 

2 

3from __future__ import annotations 

4 

5from collections.abc import Callable 

6from typing import TYPE_CHECKING, Any 

7 

8from lazy_bear import LazyLoader 

9 

10if TYPE_CHECKING: 

11 from inspect import BoundArguments, Signature 

12 

13 from pydantic import BaseModel 

14else: 

15 BaseModel = LazyLoader("pydantic").to("BaseModel") 

16 

17 

18def dynamic_methods[T]( 

19 methods: dict[str, dict[str, Any]] | BaseModel, 

20 delegate_to: str, 

21 doc: str | None = None, 

22) -> Callable[..., T]: # type: ignore[misc] # This is fine but pyright is confused 

23 """Class decorator that adds methods dynamically with proper parameter binding. 

24 

25 Args: 

26 methods: A dictionary where keys are method names and values are dictionaries of keyword arguments 

27 to be passed to the delegated method. It can also be a Pydantic BaseModel instance with 

28 fields representing method names and their corresponding keyword arguments. It will 

29 be converted to a dictionary using `model_dump(exclude_none=True)`. 

30 delegate_to: The name of the method to which the new methods will delegate. 

31 doc: Optional docstring template for the new methods. If provided, it should include placeholders 

32 `{name}` for the method name and `{delegate_to}` for the delegated method name. 

33 

34 Returns: 

35 A class decorator that adds the specified methods to the decorated class. 

36 """ 

37 if isinstance(methods, BaseModel): 37 ↛ 38line 37 didn't jump to line 38 because the condition on line 37 was never true

38 methods = methods.model_dump(exclude_none=True) 

39 

40 def decorator(cls: T) -> T: 

41 from bear_dereth.typing_tools import get_function_signature # noqa: PLC0415 

42 

43 def create_method(name: str, method_kwargs: dict[str, Any]) -> Callable: 

44 def method[Return_T: Callable](self: T, *args, **kwargs) -> Return_T: # type: ignore[misc] # This is fine but pyright is confused 

45 base_method: Any = getattr(self, delegate_to) 

46 sig: Signature = get_function_signature(base_method) 

47 bound: BoundArguments = sig.bind_partial(*args) 

48 final_kwargs: dict[str, Any] = {**method_kwargs, **kwargs} 

49 return base_method(*bound.args, **final_kwargs) 

50 

51 default_doc = "Dynamically added method '{name}' that delegates to '{delegate_to}'." 

52 

53 method.__name__ = name 

54 method.__doc__ = ( 

55 doc.format(name=name, delegate_to=delegate_to) 

56 if doc 

57 else default_doc.format(name=name, delegate_to=delegate_to) 

58 ) 

59 return method 

60 

61 for method_name, method_kwargs in methods.items(): 

62 if not hasattr(cls, method_name): 

63 setattr(cls, method_name, create_method(method_name, method_kwargs)) 

64 

65 return cls 

66 

67 return decorator 

68
